ComicInfo.Summary:
WHO WILL DIE AT THE HANDS OF THE NEW GODS? Now imbued with the power of a god, the Being leads his new keepers on a mission to purify the Earth. Wrongdoers face the wrath of a god living among us, while true believers reap the benefits of god who appears before them, rewarding them for their faith. However, it's only a matter of time before the power goes to the Being's head... and with the knowledge that one of his very own has betrayed him, how long will it take before this all powerful god looks upon humanity with fury?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Abhishek Malsuni & Shashank Mishra | 1 | B | Cover B | Eric J & Alessia Nocera | 2 | C | Cover C | Giuseppe Cafaro, Devgear & David Ocampo | 3 |
